p.d: A man's body is found floating under a jetty. He had disappeared the previous night during a noctural sea outing. The investigation quickly reveals that he was killed on the boat. But of the four people present, which is the killer? Directed by: Christophe Douchand (season 1, France, 2017) Screenplay: Thomas Perrier Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), Renaud Leymans (Éric Vernet) Genre: detective
